description: Schemas in #/definitions detect or validate keys/objects used in describing Choice, Composite, List, Independents (Sections 3.2.7 and 3.2.8).
title: Definitions: Choice, Composite, List, Independents.

$eref.description: True when object has type key and object's type is 'Choice' (Section 3.2.7)
$eref.title: Definition: Choice type

$eref.description: True when the object includes items key and value of items is an array containing at least 1 item, which can be a specificResource, an externalWebResource, a uri, a textualBody or another choice/set (Sections 3.2.7 and 3.2.8).
$eref.title: Definition: items

_88choiceDetected.description: True when object's type is 'Choice' and the object has an items array (Section 3.2.7)
_88choiceDetected.title: Detection: Choice

$eref.description: True when object has type key and object's type is 'Composite' (Section 3.2.7)
$eref.title: Definition: Composite type

$eref.description: True when the object includes items key and value of items is an array containing at least 1 item, which can be a specificResource, an externalWebResource, a uri, a textualBody or another choice/set (Sections 3.2.7 and 3.2.8).
$eref.title: Definition: items

_88compositeDetected.description: True when object's type is 'Composite' and the object has an items array (Section 3.2.8)
_88compositeDetected.title: Detection: Composite

$eref.description: True when object's type is one of Choice, Composite, List or Independents and the object has an items array (Section 3.2.7)
$eref.title: Detection: Choice or Set

$eref.description: True when object has type key and object's type is 'List' (Section 3.2.7)
$eref.title: Definition: List type

$eref.description: True when the object includes items key and value of items is an array containing at least 1 item, which can be a specificResource, an externalWebResource, a uri, a textualBody or another choice/set (Sections 3.2.7 and 3.2.8).
$eref.title: Definition: items

_88listDetected.description: True when object's type is 'List' and the object has an items array (Section 3.2.7)
_88listDetected.title: Detection: List

_88listTypeDefinition.description: True when object has type key and object's type is 'List' (Section 3.2.7)
_88listTypeDefinition.title: Definition: List type

_88compositeTypeDefinition.description: True when object has type key and object's type is 'Composite' (Section 3.2.7)
_88compositeTypeDefinition.title: Definition: Composite type

$eref.description: True when object has type key and object's type is 'Independents' (Section 3.2.7)
$eref.title: Definition: Independents type

$eref.description: True when the object includes items key and value of items is an array containing at least 1 item, which can be a specificResource, an externalWebResource, a uri, a textualBody or another choice/set (Sections 3.2.7 and 3.2.8).
$eref.title: Definition: items

_88independentsDetected.description: True when object's type is 'Independents' and the object has an items array (Section 3.2.7)
_88independentsDetected.title: Detection: Independents

_88independentsTypeDefinition.description: True when object has type key and object's type is 'Independents' (Section 3.2.7)
_88independentsTypeDefinition.title: Definition: Independents type

$eref.description: True when object's type is one of Choice, Composite, List or Independents and the object has an items array (Section 3.2.7)
$eref.title: Detection: Choice or Set

_88itemsDetected.description: True when the object includes items key and value of items is an array containing at least 1 item, which can be a specificResource, an externalWebResource, a uri, a textualBody or another choice/set (Sections 3.2.7 and 3.2.8).
_88itemsDetected.title: Definition: items

$eref.description: True when object has exactly 1 source value and at least one of purpose, selector, state, styleClass, renderedVia, scope (Section 4)
$eref.title: Detection: Specific Resource

$eref.description: True when the object is an External Web Resource, i.e., includes an id that is of format uri but does not contain value (Textual Body) or source (Specific Resource) keys (Sections 3.2.1, 3.2.4, 4).
$eref.title: Definition: External Web Resource

$eref.description: True when the object is an Embedded Textual Body, i.e., includes the value key (Section 3.2.4).
$eref.title: Definition: Embedded Textual Body

$eref.description: True when object has type key and object's type is any of 'Choice', 'Composite', 'List', 'Independents' (Section 3.2.7)
$eref.title: Definition: Choice or Set type

$eref.description: True when the object includes items key and value of items is an array containing at least 1 item, which can be a specificResource, an externalWebResource, a uri, a textualBody or another choice/set (Sections 3.2.7 and 3.2.8).
$eref.title: Definition: items

_88choiceOrSetTypeDefinition.description: True when object has type key and object's type is any of 'Choice', 'Composite', 'List', 'Independents' (Section 3.2.7)
_88choiceOrSetTypeDefinition.title: Definition: Choice or Set type

_88choiceTypeDefinition.description: True when object has type key and object's type is 'Choice' (Section 3.2.7)
_88choiceTypeDefinition.title: Definition: Choice type

$eref.description: True when object's type is one of Choice, Composite, List or Independents and the object has an items array (Section 3.2.7)
$eref.title: Detection: Choice or Set

$eref.description: True when object has type key and object's type is any of 'Choice', 'Composite', 'List', 'Independents' (Section 3.2.7)
$eref.title: Definition: Choice or Set type

$eref.description: True when the object includes items key and value of items is an array containing at least 1 item, which can be a specificResource, an externalWebResource, a uri, a textualBody or another choice/set (Sections 3.2.7 and 3.2.8).
$eref.title: Definition: items

_88choiceOrSetDetected.description: True when object's type is one of Choice, Composite, List or Independents and the object has an items array (Section 3.2.7)
_88choiceOrSetDetected.title: Detection: Choice or Set
